game_description: Cave Digger 2: Dig Harder is a 1-4 player VR adventure game in alternative western frontier. Gear up with the tools you like and explore the ever-shifting caves ahead. With new gadgets and upgrades, youâ€™ll be ready to go to new locations and dig deeper into the mountains than any adventurer before. But beware! Youâ€™re not alone. Itâ€™s good to keep a six-shooter close just in case. Follow in the footsteps of the treasure hunter Clayton and discover the strange history of the Valley and the caves below. Explore old mines, nautical caves, ruins of an ancient civilization and find the pages to a tale of greed, eldritch power and secrets beyond space & time. Who the mysterious Clayton was and what he did in the Valley becomes clear in the end, but is it really the end? Cave Digger 2 has many hidden endings, each revealing a new side to the story. Co-op crossplay. Player customization options from clothes to faces to hats. Take your pickaxe and head to the new frontier! discord.gg/cavedigger
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish (Spain), Thai

review_2: Iâ€™ve been playing this game for a while and is very fun if you can find the right players (or any players) but one problem is the riddles, they take so long to answer and sometimes I leave them because they are too hard. But overall a great game with a few tiny bugs and a great experience (Also to anyone who already has this please host rooms I want to play with people) Also use dynamite to explode the safes ;)
review_3: I just started playing like an hour ago and my headset died. So I got on later but. I didnâ€™t save my progress. Can you guys fix that?
review_4: This is an amazing game and I love it BUT there is one tiny thing that is a little bit annoying the way you change clothes is ONLY in base camp so if I want to change with my friends I have to drag them back to base camp can you please either make houses in every location or make it editable in the menu THANK YOU FOR THIS GAME
review_5: The game sufferes from a severe playability issue. Often times, the game will stick me in the loading screen, and I'll be unable to do anything from there. It happens randomly. It did it to me twice during the tutorial, even once after I had deposited my haul from doing a bounty. There's no way to get out other than reloading the game, and, as far as I know, there's nothing that even should be prompting it. Regardless, the gameplay is fun, and I would play it more if there wasn't an issue as prominent as this. Maybe it's just me suffering from it though, I haven't seen anyone else have this issue yet.
